Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
Pennsylvania Department of Highways v. Izzi, Appellant.
Argued April 30, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Éagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
George A. D’Angelo, for appellant.
Edward D. Werblun, Assistant Attorney General, with him John Craig Olemmens and Michael R. Deck-man, Assistant Attorneys General, John R. Remolla, Deputy Attorney General, and William G. Sennett, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellee.
July 1, 1968:
